summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a financial matter related to Staley's brother. The email contains a link to a news article and includes a confidentiality notice indicating that the communication may be privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a financial matter involving Jes Staley's brother.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses a payment made by his brother.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley are connected through a personal communication regarding financial matters.

keyFacts: The email discusses a financial matter involving Jes Staley's brother.
The email contains a link to a news article.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
